sentences.sContent: The photo of the settee is in a little nook on the side of the staircase.
sentences.sContent_eng: The photo of the settee is in a little nook on the side of the staircase.
sentences.sCn: 这张靠背沙发的照片是楼梯边上的一个角落。

trans.tranCn: 有靠背的长椅；中型沙发
trans.tranOther: a long comfortable seat with a back and usually with arms, for more than one person to sit on
